job.title: C++ Game Developer - Remote Okay
job.description:
If you are an experienced C++ Game Developer, please read on!
We are a fast-growing game company and we are building an exciting new casino game platform.
What You Will Be Doing
Design and develop new casino games and gaming systems.
Develop fault-tolerant systems that can run 24/7/365.
Engage with team members and work directly with the product owner and technical lead to ensure the continuous development of quality products.
What You Need for this Position
4 years of professional experience
Solid foundation in C++
Solid foundation in C
Solid foundation in programming data structures
Mobile development for IOS and Android platforms
BS in CS or EE
Understanding of UI and "pixel perfect" products
Preferred
Game development experience
HTML, CSS, JavaScript (ES6) and Three.js
C#, Java, Win32, C++ 11 and C++ 14 constructs
Embedded / Firmware development in C
What's In It for You
Salary
Benefits
Fast-growing company
Fun industry (video games for gambling)
So, if you are an experienced C++ Game Developer, please apply today!
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Robert.Owen@CyberCoders.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : RO1-1649070 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Robert Owen - Principal Recruiter - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
